009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.Kernel2D;
012import imagingbook.common.util.parameters.DialogParameterBundle;
013
014
015/**
016 * Common interface for Tschumperle-Deriche filter implementations.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 */
020public interface TschumperleDericheF {
021        
022        /**
023         * Parameter bundle for Tschumperle-Deriche filters (implementations of {@link TschumperleDericheF}).
024         */
025        public static class Parameters implements DialogParameterBundle {
026                
027                @DialogLabel("Number of iterations")
028                public int iterations = 20;     
029                
030                @DialogLabel("dt (Time step)")
031                public double dt = 20.0;                
032                
033                @DialogLabel("Gradient smoothing (sigmaD)")
034                public double sigmaD  = 0.5;
035                
036                @DialogLabel("Structure tensor smoothing (sigmaM)")
037                public double sigmaM  = 0.5;
038                
039                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along minimal variations (a0)") //small value = strong smoothing
040                public float a0 = 0.25f;        
041                
042                @DialogLabel("Diffusion limiter along maximal variations (a1)") //small value = strong smoothing
043                public float a1 = 0.90f;
044                
045                /** The alpha value applied in the first pass. */
046                @DialogHide
047                public float alpha0 = 0.5f;
048        }
049        
050
051        abstract class Constants {
052                private static final float C1 = (float) (2 - Math.sqrt(2.0)) / 4;
053                private static final float C2 = (float) (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1) / 2;
054
055                private static final float[][] Hdx = // gradient kernel X
056                        {{-C1, 0, C1},
057                         {-C2, 0, C2},
058                         {-C1, 0, C1}};
059                
060                private static final float[][] Hdy = // gradient kernel Y
061                        {{-C1, -C2, -C1},
062                         {  0,   0,   0},
063                         { C1,  C2,  C1}};
064                
065                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDx = new Kernel2D(Hdx, 1, 1, false);
066                protected static final Kernel2D kernelDy = new Kernel2D(Hdy, 1, 1, false);
067        }
068        
069
070        
071
072}
